article_text: Nathan MacKinnon has won the Calder Trophy as the NHL rookie of the year. He's the second Avalanche player in three years to win. Gabriel Landeskog won in 2012.

article_metadata.description: Live blogs, live chats and other live and breaking news events from Denver and Colorado.

og.description: The Post's Adrian Dater is following all the action as the National Hockey League announces the winners of its 2013-14 awards at Wynn Las Vegas, starting at 5 p.m. MT.
og.title: Live Blog: 2014 NHL Awards

article_metadata.news_keywords: Live blogs, live chat, breaking news, live events, live, denver post, denver post live, @denverpost, twitter, facebook, social, updates

article_summary:
Nathan MacKinnon has won the Calder Trophy as the NHL rookie of the year.
Gabriel Landeskog won in 2012.
He's the second Avalanche player in three years to win.
